author: Brian Tyrell
text:
The Washington Township Fire Department (WTFD) is attempting to identify a process to update WTFD job descriptions.  Specifically, I am interested in learning more about job analysis models used to develop job descriptions. Listed below are a few research questions:
1.What are the human resource (private and public sector) job analysis models for developing job descriptions?
2.What are the legal guidelines for developing job descriptions?
3.What job analysis methods are other municipalities (FD, PD, DPW) using to develop their job descriptions?
4.Any suggestions on literature review, or past surveys that would prove useful?
Any suggestions input or feedback will be greatly appreciated.
title: Job Analysis Methods Used to Develop FD Job Descriptions
